verses.verse: The princes<WH8269> of the people<WH5971> lived<WH3427> in Jerusalem:<WH3389> the rest<WH7605> of the people<WH5971> also cast<WH5307> lots,<WH1486> to bring<WH935> one<WH259> of ten<WH6235> to dwell<WH3427> in Jerusalem<WH3389> the holy<WH6944> city,<WH5892> and nine<WH8672> parts<WH3027> in the other cities.<WH5892>
The people<WH5971> blessed<WH1288> all the men<WH582> who willingly offered<WH5068> themselves to dwell<WH3427> in Jerusalem.<WH3389>

Now these are the chiefs<WH7218> of the province<WH4082> who lived<WH3427> in Jerusalem;<WH3389> but in the cities<WH5892> of Judah<WH3063> everyone<WH376> lived<WH3427> in his possession<WH272> in their cities:<WH5892> Israel,<WH3478> the priests,<WH3548> and the Levites,<WH3881> and the Nethinim,<WH5411> and the children<WH1121> of Solomon<WH8010>'s servants.<WH5650>

In Jerusalem<WH3389> lived<WH3427> certain of the children<WH1121> of Judah,<WH3063> and of the children<WH1121> of Benjamin.<WH1144> Of the children<WH1121> of Judah:<WH3063> Athaiah<WH6265> the son<WH1121> of Uzziah,<WH5818> the son<WH1121> of Zechariah,<WH2148> the son<WH1121> of Amariah,<WH568> the son<WH1121> of Shephatiah,<WH8203> the son<WH1121> of Mahalalel,<WH4111> of the children<WH1121> of Perez;<WH6557>

and Maaseiah<WH4641> the son<WH1121> of Baruch,<WH1263> the son<WH1121> of Colhozeh,<WH3626> the son<WH1121> of Hazaiah,<WH2382> the son<WH1121> of Adaiah,<WH5718> the son<WH1121> of Joiarib,<WH3114> the son<WH1121> of Zechariah,<WH2148> the son<WH1121> of the Shilonite.<WH8023>
All the sons<WH1121> of Perez<WH6557> who lived<WH3427> in Jerusalem<WH3389> were four<WH702> hundred<WH3967> sixty<WH8346> - eight<WH8083> valiant<WH2428> men.<WH582>

These are the sons<WH1121> of Benjamin:<WH1144> Sallu<WH5543> the son<WH1121> of Meshullam,<WH4918> the son<WH1121> of Joed,<WH3133> the son<WH1121> of Pedaiah,<WH6305> the son<WH1121> of Kolaiah,<WH6964> the son<WH1121> of Maaseiah,<WH4641> the son<WH1121> of Ithiel,<WH384> the son<WH1121> of Jeshaiah.<WH3470>
After<WH310> him Gabbai,<WH1373> Sallai,<WH5543> nine<WH8672> hundred<WH3967> twenty<WH6242> - eight.<WH8083>
Joel<WH3100> the son<WH1121> of Zichri<WH2147> was their overseer;<WH6496> and Judah<WH3063> the son<WH1121> of Hassenuah<WH5574> was second<WH4932> over the city.<WH5892>
Of the priests:<WH3548> Jedaiah<WH3048> the son<WH1121> of Joiarib,<WH3114> Jachin,<WH3199>

Seraiah<WH8304> the son<WH1121> of Hilkiah,<WH2518> the son<WH1121> of Meshullam,<WH4918> the son<WH1121> of Zadok,<WH6659> the son<WH1121> of Meraioth,<WH4812> the son<WH1121> of Ahitub,<WH285> the ruler<WH5057> of the house<WH1004> of God,<WH430>

and their brothers<WH251> who did<WH6213> the work<WH4399> of the house,<WH1004> eight<WH8083> hundred<WH3967> twenty<WH6242> - two;<WH8147> and Adaiah<WH5718> the son<WH1121> of Jeroham,<WH3395> the son<WH1121> of Pelaliah,<WH6421> the son<WH1121> of Amzi,<WH557> the son<WH1121> of Zechariah,<WH2148> the son<WH1121> of Pashhur,<WH6583> the son<WH1121> of Malchijah,<WH4441>

and his brothers,<WH251> chiefs<WH7218> of fathers<WH1>' households,<WH8147> two hundred<WH3967> forty<WH705> - two;<WH8147> and Amashsai<WH6023> the son<WH1121> of Azarel,<WH5832> the son<WH1121> of Ahzai,<WH273> the son<WH1121> of Meshillemoth,<WH4919> the son<WH1121> of Immer,<WH564>

and their brothers,<WH251> mighty men<WH1368> of valor,<WH2428> one hundred<WH3967> twenty<WH6242> - eight;<WH8083> and their overseer<WH6496> was Zabdiel,<WH2068> the son<WH1121> of Haggedolim.<WH1419>
Of the Levites:<WH3881> Shemaiah<WH8098> the son<WH1121> of Hasshub,<WH2815> the son<WH1121> of Azrikam,<WH5840> the son<WH1121> of Hashabiah,<WH2811> the son<WH1121> of Bunni;<WH1138>
and Shabbethai<WH7678> and Jozabad,<WH3107> of the chiefs<WH7218> of the Levites,<WH3881> who had the oversight of the outward<WH2435> business<WH4399> of the house<WH1004> of God;<WH430>

and Mattaniah<WH4983> the son<WH1121> of Mica,<WH4316> the son<WH1121> of Zabdi,<WH2067> the son<WH1121> of Asaph,<WH623> who was the chief<WH7218> to begin<WH8462> the thanksgiving<WH3034> in prayer,<WH8605> and Bakbukiah,<WH1229> the second<WH4932> among his brothers;<WH251> and Abda<WH5653> the son<WH1121> of Shammua,<WH8051> the son<WH1121> of Galal,<WH1559> the son<WH1121> of Jeduthun.<WH3038>
All the Levites<WH3881> in the holy<WH6944> city<WH5892> were two hundred<WH3967> eighty<WH8084> - four.<WH702>
Moreover the porters,<WH7778> Akkub,<WH6126> Talmon,<WH2929> and their brothers,<WH251> who kept<WH8104> watch at the gates,<WH8179> were one hundred<WH3967> seventy<WH7657> - two.<WH8147>
The residue<WH7605> of Israel,<WH3478> of the priests,<WH3548> the Levites,<WH3881> were in all the cities<WH5892> of Judah,<WH3063> everyone<WH376> in his inheritance.<WH5159>
But the Nethinim<WH5411> lived<WH3427> in Ophel:<WH6077> and Ziha<WH6727> and Gishpa<WH1658> were over the Nethinim.<WH5411>

The overseer<WH6496> also of the Levites<WH3881> at Jerusalem<WH3389> was Uzzi<WH5813> the son<WH1121> of Bani,<WH1137> the son<WH1121> of Hashabiah,<WH2811> the son<WH1121> of Mattaniah,<WH4983> the son<WH1121> of Mica,<WH4316> of the sons<WH1121> of Asaph,<WH623> the singers,<WH7891> over<WH5048> the business<WH4399> of the house<WH1004> of God.<WH430>
For there was a commandment<WH4687> from the king<WH4428> concerning them,<WH548> and a settled provision for the singers,<WH7891> as every day<WH3117> required.<WH1697>

Pethahiah<WH6611> the son<WH1121> of Meshezabel,<WH4898> of the children<WH1121> of Zerah<WH2226> the son<WH1121> of Judah,<WH3063> was at the king<WH4428>'s hand<WH3027> in all matters<WH1697> concerning the people.<WH5971>

As for the villages,<WH2691> with their fields,<WH7704> some of the children<WH1121> of Judah<WH3063> lived<WH3427> in Kiriath Arba<WH7153> and its towns,<WH2691> and in Dibon<WH1769> and its towns,<WH2691> and in Jekabzeel<WH3343> and its villages,<WH1323>
and in Jeshua,<WH3442> and in Moladah,<WH4137> and Beth Pelet,<WH1046>
and in Hazar Shual,<WH2705> and in Beersheba<WH884> and its towns,<WH1323>
and in Ziklag,<WH6860> and in Meconah<WH4368> and in its towns,<WH1323>
and in En Rimmon,<WH5884> and in Zorah,<WH6881> and in Jarmuth,<WH3412>

Zanoah,<WH2182> Adullam,<WH5725> and their villages,<WH2691> Lachish<WH3923> and its fields,<WH7704> Azekah<WH5825> and its towns.<WH1323> So they encamped<WH2583> from Beersheba<WH884> to the valley<WH1516> of Hinnom.<WH2011>
The children<WH1121> of Benjamin<WH1144> also lived from Geba<WH1387> onward,<WH4363> at Michmash and Aija,<WH5857> and at Bethel<WH1008> and its towns,<WH1323>
at Anathoth,<WH6068> Nob,<WH5011> Ananiah,<WH6055>
Hazor,<WH2674> Ramah,<WH7414> Gittaim,<WH1664>
Hadid,<WH2307> Zeboim,<WH6650> Neballat,<WH5041>
Lod,<WH3850> and Ono,<WH207> the valley<WH1516> of craftsmen.<WH2791>
Of the Levites,<WH3881> certain divisions<WH4256> in Judah<WH3063> settled in Benjamin<WH1144>'s territory.
